${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:HighCost.NAME: High Cost
${modID}:HighCost.DESCRIPTION: The first time you play this card in combat, gain [E] .

${modID}:Bad.NAME: Bad
${modID}:Bad.DESCRIPTION: Get a copy of this card. Removed from your deck on use.

${modID}:Frontload.NAME: Frontload
${modID}:Frontload.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less and adds Exhaust in Act 1.

${modID}:Planning.NAME: Planning
${modID}:Planning.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less and adds Exhaust in Act 4.

${modID}:WorseThanCurse.NAME: Worse Than Curse
${modID}:WorseThanCurse.DESCRIPTION: Remove this card and gain Ascender's Bane.

${modID}:NeedUpgrade.NAME: Need Upgrade
${modID}:NeedUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade this card. Remove a random upgraded card and get downgraded copy from your deck.

${modID}:NoNeedUpgrade.NAME: No Need Upgrade
${modID}:NoNeedUpgrade.DESCRIPTION: Downgrade this card. This card cannot be upgraded. Upgrade a random card from your deck.

${modID}:TrashWithoutSnecko.NAME: Trash Without Snecko
${modID}:TrashWithoutSnecko.DESCRIPTION: When you play this card, get Confused and draw a card.
